humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, multiple left axillary sentinel lymph nodes were excised and all of them were negative for tumor (AJCC pN0(i-)(sn)). This indicates that there is no metastatic carcinoma in the sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes, and all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, based on the rules provided, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that multiple (8) left axillary sentinel lymph nodes were excised and were all negative for tumor (AJCC pN0(i-)(sn)). This indicates that there is no evidence of cancer in the sentinel lymph nodes, which corresponds to an N0 stage.
